formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DAHDISendKeypadFacility' =-
[Synopsis] Send digits out of band over a PRI
[Description] DAHDISendKeypadFacility(): This application will send the given string of digits in a Keypad Facility IE over the current channel.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 () zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,8 +1,8 @@ - -= Info about application 'ZapSendKeypadFacility' =- + -= Info about application 'DAHDISendKeypadFacility' =-
[Synopsis] Send digits out of band over a PRI
[Description] - ZapSendKeypadFacility(): This application will send the given string of digits in a Keypad Facility + DAHDISendKeypadFacility(): This application will send the given string of digits in a Keypad Facility IE over the current channel.
